FuncDef: This command enables PPPoE Maximum-Receive-Unit (MRU) negotiations greater than 1492 bytes without the need to receive a "PPP-Max-Payload" tag in PADI/PADR from the client as defined in RFC 4638,Accommodating a Maximum Transit Unit/Maximum Receive Unit (MTU/MRU) Greater Than 1492 in the Point-to-Point Protocol over Ethernet (PPPoE).
